participant_1.background:
I am proud of my career, but I still miss my dad.
i enjoy vacations at the beach.
I wake up early and enjoy a cup of coffee with my boyfriend before we head to work.
I have no siblings, but I love spending time with my friends and family at our cabin in the woods on the lake.
my favorite band is ween.

participant_2.background:
I am a YouTuber who creates content for my audience.
I spent a week in Mexico eating all of the Mexican food I could find.
I'm a radio DJ with a sweet tooth.
I've managed to manage my diabetes well enough to become a bartender.
my mother is from russia.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! What do you do for a living?
I'm a YouTuber and a radio DJ.
Cool, what kind of content do you create?
I make videos about my life and I also do some cooking and travel videos.
That sounds fun! I love cooking and travel. What's your favorite type of cuisine to cook?
I love Mexican food! I recently spent a week in Mexico and ate all of the Mexican food I could find.
Oh that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Mexico. I love Mexican food too, but I've never had it authentic Mexican food.
You have to go! It's the best Mexican food you'll ever have.
I'll definitely have to put it on my bucket list. I'm also really interested in learning more about your job as a radio DJ.
It's really fun! I get to play music and talk to people all day long.
That sounds like a great job! I would love to be able to do that.
It's a lot of fun, but it's also a lot of work. You have to be really good at talking on the spot and being able to think on your feet.
I can see how that would be challenging. But I think it would be a lot of fun too.
It is! I love my job.
I'm glad to hear that. It sounds like you have a really great job.
Thanks! I'm lucky to be able to do what I love.
